entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS EARLY THIS EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
